languages.text: {n}Кассия едва заметно кривится и поправляет украшение посреди лба, а затем смущенно скрывает когтистые пальцы в складках одежд. Необычный облик навигаторов часто становится предметом сплетен как среди низших слуг, так и среди офицеров. Очевидно, на корабле, полном новых людей, Леди-Навигатор чувствует себя весьма некомфортно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия едва заметно кривится и поправляет украшение посреди лба, а затем смущенно скрывает когтистые пальцы в складках одежд. Необычный облик Навигаторов часто становится предметом сплетен как среди низших слуг, так и среди офицеров. Очевидно, на корабле, полном новых людей, Леди-навигатор чувствует себя весьма некомфортно.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia cringes ever so slightly, adjusts the adornment on her forehead, then awkwardly hides her clawed fingers in the folds of her clothes. The unnatural appearance of Navigators often becomes the topic of gossip among lowly servants and officers alike. It is clear that she does not feel comfortable aboard a ship teeming with new people.{/n}

Очевидно, на корабле, полном новых людей, Леди-Навигатор чувствует себя весьма некомфортно.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia verzieht ganz leicht das Gesicht, richtet sich den Schmuck auf ihrer Stirn und verbirgt dann ihre klauenbewehrten Finger in den Falten ihrer Kleidung. Das unnatürliche Aussehen von Navigatoren wird oft zum Gesprächsthema tratschender Diener und Offiziere. Sie fühlt sich offenkundig nicht wohl auf einem Schiff voller ihr unbekannter Leute.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cringes ever so slightly, adjusts the adornment on her forehead, then awkwardly hides her clawed fingers in the folds of her clothes. The unnatural appearance of Navigators often becomes the topic of gossip among lowly servants and officers alike. It is clear that she does not feel comfortable aboard a ship teeming with new people.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia verzieht ganz leicht das Gesicht, richtet sich den Schmuck auf ihrer Stirn und verbirgt dann ihre klauenbewehrten Finger in den Falten ihrer Kleidung. Das ungewöhnliche Aussehen von Navigatoren wird oft zum Gesprächsthema tratschender Diener und Offiziere. Sie fühlt sich offenkundig nicht wohl auf einem Schiff voller ihr unbekannter Leute.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia tressaille légèrement, ajuste l'ornement sur son front, puis cache maladroitement ses doigts griffus dans les plis de ses habits. L'apparence surnaturelle des navigateurs fait souvent l'objet de ragots parmi les officiers et les serviteurs du bas peuple. Manifestement, elle ne se sent pas à l'aise à bord d'un vaisseau rempli de nouveaux visages.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cringes ever so slightly, adjusts the adornment on her forehead, then awkwardly hides her clawed fingers in the folds of her clothes. The unnatural appearance of Navigators often becomes the topic of gossip among lowly servants and officers alike. It is clear that she does not feel comfortable aboard a ship teeming with new people.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia tressaille légèrement, ajuste l'ornement sur son front, puis cache maladroitement ses doigts griffus dans les plis de ses habits. L'apparence inhabituelle des navigateurs fait souvent l'objet de ragots parmi les officiers et les serviteurs du bas peuple. Manifestement, elle ne se sent pas à l'aise à bord d'un vaisseau rempli de nouveaux visages.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅微微瑟缩起身子，摸了摸额头上的装饰品，随后笨拙地将锋利的指尖藏进衣物的重重皱褶中。导航者由于异于常人的外貌，常常会成为底层仆佣与军官茶余饭后的谈资。很显然，她并不习惯居住在这艘到处都是陌生人的飞船上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cringes ever so slightly, adjusts the adornment on her forehead, then awkwardly hides her clawed fingers in the folds of her clothes. The unnatural appearance of Navigators often becomes the topic of gossip among lowly servants and officers alike. It is clear that she does not feel comfortable aboard a ship teeming with new people.{/n}

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアはわずかにしりごみし、額の装飾を整えると、爪のついた指をおずおずと衣装のひだの中にしまう。航宙士の外見は不自然なので、下位の使用人や士官の間でうわさ話にのぼることが非常に多い。新しい人員が多い船に乗りこむのは、彼女にとって快適ではないことは明らかだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cringes ever so slightly, adjusts the adornment on her forehead, then awkwardly hides her clawed fingers in the folds of her clothes. The unnatural appearance of Navigators often becomes the topic of gossip among lowly servants and officers alike. It is clear that she does not feel comfortable aboard a ship teeming with new people.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはわずかにしりごみし、額の装飾を整えると、爪のついた指をおずおずと衣装のひだの中にしまう。航宙士の外見は不自然なので、下位の使用人や士官の間でうわさ話にのぼることが非常に多い。新しい人員が多い船に乗りこむのは、彼女にとって快適ではないことは明らかだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia siente vergüenza, se ajusta el adorno de la frente y luego esconde torpemente los dedos con garras entre los pliegues de su ropa. El antinatural aspecto de los navegantes se convierte a menudo en tema de cotilleo tanto entre humildes sirvientes como entre oficiales. Está claro que no se siente cómoda a bordo de una nave repleta de gente nueva.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cringes ever so slightly, adjusts the adornment on her forehead, then awkwardly hides her clawed fingers in the folds of her clothes. The unnatural appearance of Navigators often becomes the topic of gossip among lowly servants and officers alike. It is clear that she does not feel comfortable aboard a ship teeming with new people.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia, olduğu yere hafiften siniyor. Alnındaki süsü düzeltiyor. Sonra da uzun tırnaklı parmaklarını beceriksizce kıyafetinin katları arasına gizliyor. Rotacılar, sıra dışı görünüşleri dolayısıyla sık sık avam hizmetkârların, subayların dedikodu malzemesi olabiliyor. Kadının, tanımadığı insanlarla dolu bir gemide rahat hissetmediği belli.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cringes ever so slightly, adjusts the adornment on her forehead, then awkwardly hides her clawed fingers in the folds of her clothes. The unnatural appearance of Navigators often becomes the topic of gossip among lowly servants and officers alike. It is clear that she does not feel comfortable aboard a ship teeming with new people.{/n}
